title: Bombardier - Revenues by segment 2018
summary: In 2018 , close to half of all by ad U.S. in the Revenues was generated through Transportation Segment .
About a third of the U.S. came from by Business_Aircraft that year .
Aerostructures_and_Engineering_Services Segment in the United StatesIn 2018 , by Segment in the Revenues generated a total U.S. of about 107 billion Bombardier Revenues dollars .
gold: This statistic gives a breakdown of Bombardier 's revenue in the fiscal year of 2018 , by segment . The Montreal-headquartered company had revenues of approximately five billion U.S. dollars in its business aircraft segment .
